creditline:
The William M. Ladd Collection
Gift of Herschel V. Jones, 1916
inscription:
LL recto, in pencil: Whistler. The Wine Glass
LL verso, in pencil: 228 / a22237.
provenance: (Kennedy Galleries, New York, sold to Ladd); William M. Ladd, Portland, Ore., sold to Jones; Herschel V. Jones, Minneapolis, 1916; given to MIA, 1916.
signed: Signed ion the plate, LL (diagonally): Whistler
title: The Wine Glass
